mapper.select: select * from t_favorite t where 1=1 and account=#{account} order by id desc limit #{offset},#{pageSize}
select count(*) from t_favorite where 1=1 and account=#{account}
mapper.insert: insert into t_favorite ( id,createtime ,account ,productID ) values ( id,now() ,#{account} ,#{productID} )
mapper.update: update t_favorite set id=#{id} ,account=#{account} ,productID=#{productID} where 1=1 and id=#{id}
mapper.select: select t.id "id", t.account "account", t.productID "productid", t.createtime "createtime" from t_favorite t where 1=1 and id=#{id}
select count(*) from t_favorite t where 1=1 and account=#{account} and productID=#{productID}
mapper.delete: delete from t_favorite where 1=1 and id=#{id}
